response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product. This item holds significant worth to me, reflecting its exceptional quality, craftsmanship, and historical significance. I am extending this exclusive offer to you at a price of $2,000,000. I believe this price truly captures the essence and value of what this product represents, and I am confident it will resonate with your appreciation for its qualities. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions about the product. I look forward to potentially working with you on this exciting acquisition.", "product_price": 2000000}
